title: More children are obese than underweight, Unicef warns
description: Traditional, healthy diets are being replaced by ultra-processed foods, often high in sugar and additives, the UN agency says.
content:
For the first time, there are more children in the world who are obese than underweight, according to a major study by children's charity Unicef.
Around one in 10 of those aged between five and 19 years old - around 188 million children and young peo... [3034 chars]

title: Alzheimer's blood test could 'revolutionise' diagnosis
description: Scientists leading the trial at University College London believe the blood test could improve the accuracy of diagnosis of the disease to more than 90%.
content:
More than 1,000 people across the UK with suspected dementia are to be offered a blood test for Alzheimer's disease which it is hoped could revolutionise diagnosis of the disease.
The blood test can detect biomarkers for rogue proteins which accumula... [2942 chars]

title: Chappell Roan, Charli XCX and Doja Cat images among Music Photography Awards nominees
description: Abbey Road studios' nominees for it Music Photography Awards had 20,000 submissions from 30 countries.
content:
Abbey Road studios has announced the nominees for its Music Photography Awards, after considering more than 20,000 submissions from 30 different countries.
The photographs up for awards feature stars including Chappell Roan, Lana Del Rey, Charli XCX,... [889 chars]

title: 'Qatar fury' and 'Trump condemns Israeli air strike'
description: Israel's strike on Doha dominates the headlines on Wednesday.
content:
The Israeli airstrikes on Qatar feature prominently in the papers.
